The post: s caption explicitly states that the new Rs 1000 note was released by RBI (Reserve Bank of India).
The RBI spokesperson: Yogesh Dayal, confirmed that the social media posts about the 1000 rupee banknote were false and that the central bank had not made any announcement regarding its launch or circulation.
The misleading posts of the banknote on: hand corner stating 'Artistic Imagination', indicating that the image is not authentic.
